prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Letter of Emerson Hough, Accession #7730-a, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was purchased on [15 Mar 1965] 13 May 1965.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains a letter from Emerson Hough to "My dear Madam". Hough says he has never written under a pseudonym, but has been published both as Emerson Hough and as E. Hough.
